body: Can someone help me. I’m looking for a certain hentai story. I read it once and it was amazing to me. There two guys in a research place one works there one is a subject. Both dude one has long hair then other has short hair. It was this weird thing where the short hair one has this thing where he can give birth I think and he has this aura at times that make people want to fuck him? Any of this sounds faninliar let me know the name. Thanks
i like how they inserted the character from a different manga of owal's
I heard people saying this was amazing but it's just that horrible rape to love trope
